text: beshak jin logon ne apanee aulaad ko be samajhe boojhe bevakoophee se maar daala aur jo rozee khuda ne unhen dee thee use khuda par ifatera (bohataan) baandh kar apane oopar haraam kar daala aur vah sakht ghaate mein hai ye yaqeenan raahe haq se bhatak gaai aur ye hidaayat paane vaale the bhee nahin
